post.body: amen bro...
thanks...you have a fantastic day...
congrats on the 6 year survivor milestone...
congrats...rock on in the second half! :)
ha! thanks...
i keep telling my hubby tweeting isn't "work"...it's also our last week of vaca...trying to savour every moment, not working
sounds like a good book...i'll have to check it out...happy new year to you...
thanks for Life Plan link...just what I'm looking for. hitting the big 5-0 in 09 & certainly a good time to review & tweak...
got a copy of that 7 day cleanse and liquid diet? we are in desperate need in this new year...
ha...you've only just begun... say hey to all of your peeps! see ya'll soon...
the twenty hour car ride will make for some great writing time...
cleaning party is going well...the teens must want to get home cuz they sure are working hard to clean the house and pack the car...
todays edevo: "He's Got Your Back" - http://tinyurl.com/7uhlxl
At the villages starbucks with my daughters...why does everyone look at me when I am with them? Oh its not me?
time to detach computer from body...last day at pool with kids...time in florida winding down...wahhhhh
one big question answered - my new book: JESUS: Is he really the only way? http://tinyurl.com/6u5a85
my two favorite songs today - very eclectic mix - oldie Louis Prima - "Hey Boy, Hey Girl" and Cupid's "Cupids Shuffle"... www.theradio.com
todays edevo - "Give a Bailout" - http://tinyurl.com/8gnwzv
just did my first wii fitness work out...my wii age was 61...then i did it again and now it's 37...technology is amazing...
Perfect day with kids....just had amazing rack of ribs...now at starbucks...might even line dance with grandma at town square..idgnb
